and Azure Monitor. The Azure Monitor output relies on the following solutions: * Update Management (In Azure Automation) * Anti-Malware assessment * Keyvault Analytics * Application Gateway Analytics In addition, the Secure Score information relies on regular output from the Azure Automation runbook that captures the Secure Score via the API and writes it into the Log Analytics workspace."},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Workspaces","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":""},"name":"Reliance","styleSettings":{"margin":"0","padding":"2","showBorder":true}},{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Security Overview","subTarget":"SecurityOverview","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Security Alerts","subTarget":"SecurityAlerts","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Update and Protection Status","subTarget":"UpdateStatus","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Azure Activity Log","subTarget":"ActivityLog","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Key Vault","subTarget":"KeyVault","style":"link"},{"cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Application Gateway","subTarget":"AppGateway","style":"link"}]},"name":"links - 15"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"

summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ResourceId | extend CurrentScore = round(todouble(CurrentScore_s)) | extend MaxScore = round(todouble(MaxScore_s)) | extend sScore = Score"}]}},"customWidth":"50","showPin":true,"name":"securescore","styleSettings":{"margin":"1px","padding":"1px"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"securityresources | where type contains "microsoft.security/securitystatusessummaries" | extend      Healthy = trim (' ', tostring(properties.resourceHealthSummary.healthy)),     Medium = trim (' ', tostring(properties.resourceHealthSummary.medium)),     High = trim (' ', tostring(properties.resourceHealthSummary.high)),     None = trim (' ', tostring(properties.resourceHealthSummary.none)),     Low = trim (' ', tostring(properties.resourceHealthSummary.low)),     ResourceCount = trim (' ', tostring(properties.resourceCount)) | extend Healthy = toint(iif(isnotempty(Healthy), Healthy, '0')) | extend Medium = toint(iif(isnotempty(Medium), Medium, '0')) | extend High = toint(iif(isnotempty(High), High, '0')) | extend None = toint(iif(isnotempty(None), None, '0')) | extend Low = toint(iif(isnotempty(Low), Low, '0')) | project subscriptionId, name, ResourceCount, Healthy, Medium, High, Low, None | summarize sumHealth = sum(Healthy), sumMedium = sum(Medium), sumHigh = sum(High), sumLow = sum(Low), sumNone = sum(None) by subscriptionId | extend sumAll = (todouble(sumHealth) + todouble(sumMedium) + todouble(sumHigh) + todouble(sumLow)) | extend sumUnhealthy = (todouble(sumMedium) + todouble(sumHigh) + todouble(sumLow)) | project subscriptionId, sumHealth, sumUnhealthy","size":1,"title":"Security Health | summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity, ProductName | join kind = inner (SecurityAlert | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity) on AlertSeverity | project-away TimeGenerated | extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity | union ( SecurityAlert | summarize Count = count() | extend jkey = 1 | join kind=inner (SecurityAlert | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} | extend jkey = 1) on jkey | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' ) | extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4)))) | order by
